channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- Osquery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- Osquery

item.title: CVE-2020-1887|2024-08-04T06:54:00.410Z -- facebook -- osquery
item.description: Incorrect validation of the TLS SNI hostname in osquery versions after 2.9.0 and before 4.2.0 could allow an attacker to MITM osquery traffic in the absence of a configured root chain of trust.
